name: clip-star
title: ClipStar
description: Clip all in one. Auto generate title, preview image, tags. Can connect to notion for synchronization.
author: artsmp

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

preferences.name: language
preferences.title: Language
preferences.description: Choose the language for the extension

preferences.name: model
preferences.title: AI 模型
preferences.description: 输入要使用的 AI 模型名称（可选）

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: API 密钥
preferences.description: 输入您的 API 密钥（可选）

preferences.name: baseURL
preferences.title: 基础 URL
preferences.description: 输入 API 的基础 URL（可选）

preferences.name: tableKey
preferences.title: Table Column
preferences.default: 标题,链接地址,标签,创建时间,更新时间
